Holidays¶

Class that puts holidays columns in your model object.

city (str) : The city that you want to get the holidays

state (str) : The state that you want to get the holidays

holiday_types (str or list) :

Type of holiday

optional : Insert optional holidays such as Teacher’s Day in Brazil

holiday : Insert not optional holidays such as Christmas

special : Insert special days such as Mother’s Day or Black Friday

coverage (str or list) : The coverage of the holiday: ‘national’, ‘state’, ‘municipal’

column_by_type (bool) : If true, for each holiday type will get a column in the datarame, that is, the models will treat them as different variables

eve_column (bool) : If true, an ‘eve_’ + {holiday_type} will be concatenated in the dataframe

days_of_week_to_drop (list) : A list of days of week that you don’t want to consider the holidays in that days.

holidays_to_drop (list) : A list of holidays that you don’t want to consider

{ # on dataprep_config, use the parameters above

    "featurization":{
        "holidays"{
            city :  'rio de janeiro'            
            state : 'RJ'                        
            holiday_types : ['special', 'holiday']            
            coverage : ['municipal', 'national']                    
            column_by_type : true               
            eve_column : true                       
            days_of_week_to_drop : ['monday', 'sunday']
            holidays_to_drop : ['Natal']
        }
    }

}
